greetingsCaption:
MOHON DIBACA DAN DIPERHATIKAN

- Dokumen final, no revisions after e-Meterai
- PDF 100-500kb recommended
- Final docs processed, no complaints post e-Meterai
- e-Meterai left of signature, no overlap
- Processing 5-120 min, queue-dependent
- E-meterai price: Rp. 17,000
- Work starts post-payment, QRIS accepted
